overview:
Jose ARIAS is the HR Director of FUTURA Networks for SPAIN, MEXICO, COLOMBIA, BRAZIL and the USA.

Among other products and services, FUTURA Networks organizes the “Campus Party” . The biggest and most important Internet event on Earth.

Campus Party is the largest Internet event in the world in the areas of: Innovation, Creativity, Science and Digital Entertainment. For 7 days, thousands of young people live surrounded by a unique and wonderful environment. Born in 1997 as an event for enthusiasts of the Internet, Campus Party has grown to become an unmissable event for understanding new information technology.

To date there are annual editions of the event in: Spain, Brazil, Colombia and MÃ©xico. During 2011 Campus Party will be incorporated to new countries. Workshops, Conferences & Competitions make of Campus Party a proved formative event

To join the Global Community of “campuseros” or to get more information on FUTURA, please go to our website.

http://www.campus-party.org/

More info on the BBC: http://xurl.es/LasVegas4Techies

Before joining FUTURA, Arias was the HR Director of TUENTI, one of the largest invite-only websites worldwide, the most-trafficked website in Spain surpassing even Google (according to the one of latest report from ComScore) and one of EuropeÂ´s Top Internet Companies.

Arias has been working also for Hewlett Packard as “Staffing Manager for Spain & Portugal” and for the Anglo-Dutch FMCG (Fast Moving Consumer Goods) Company UNILEVER where he reached the position of “HR Expertise Team Director”
